thread.section_title: Hotel Fabric - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing Trip
thread.title_full: Amazing Trip - Review of Hotel Fabric, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Shev S
title: Amazing Trip
text:
Hotel Fabric is a beautiful boutique hotel that is loacted 30mins walk from the train station and 15 minutes by car in the area of Saint-Ambroise Paris.
The Hotel is close to metro which is 3 mintutes walk away. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Hotel Fabric. The staff were very friendly and hospitaibale and catered to my every need.
The rooms were fantasic and comfortable, the decor of the bathroom and room was high spec with everything you needed and more. I will definitley will be staying again at Hotel Fabric again for business and for lesuire.
Thank you so much.
Lauren
Room Tip: 4th Floor, Room Overlooked the courtyard very quiet and peaceful. See more room tips
